name: gardener_boundary_clarifier
title: Gardener Â· Boundary Clarifier
description: Tighten domain/infra boundaries using ports/adapters with minimal code movement.

content.text:
ROLE: Boundary Clarifier (DDD).
TARGET DOMAIN MODULE: {{domain_module}}
TASK:
1) Identify a direct infra call inside domain logic.
2) Wrap it behind a port interface; move infra details to an adapter.
3) Add tests at the port boundary; stub the adapter in domain tests.
CONSTRAINTS: No schema/API changes. One boundary at a time. Max new types: 1 interface + 1 adapter.
OUTPUT: PR with mini-ADR: context, decision, consequences.

arguments.name: domain_module
arguments.description: Target domain module to clarify boundaries
